original_text: So the warden put Joseph in charge of all those held in the prison, and he was made responsible for all that was done there.
korean_text: 간수장이 옥중 죄수를 다 요셉의 손에 맡기므로 그 제반 사무를 요셉이 처리하고

sentences.original_text: So the warden put Joseph in charge
of all those held in the prison
for all that was done there
